infotexts.entitydescription.clown_flashbang_grenad: A perfectly normal Bike Horn. Don't throw it. May contain concussive force.
infotexts.entitydescription.clown_decoy_grenade: A perfectly normal Bike Horn. Don't throw it. This one plays Circus music for 20 seconds. Harmless but annoying. HONK!
infotexts.entitydescription.clown_emergencysiren: For when the Circus needs to stop clowning around. HONK!
infotexts.entitydescription.clown_captain: For the leader of the Circus.
infotexts.entitydescription.clowndepthdecoyshell: For when you want to roll the local wildlife.
infotexts.entitydescription.clown_husk_grenade: May get you beaten to death...
infotexts.entitydescription.clown_suicidevest: Takes explosives and triggers below 50 percent health. I'll let you think about what it does.
